definition: sound/noise/note (of musical scale)/tone/news/syllable/reading (phonetic value of a character)

sentences.english: The piano has a quaint old-world tone about it.
sentences.chinese: 这架钢琴的音色具有一种古雅的老式风味。

sentences.english: Do not use if imprinted tamber band is broken or missing.
sentences.chinese: 如果不要使用印音色带是否损坏或丢失。

sentences.english: What use is the rhyme with no tone?
sentences.chinese: 当旋律没有音色还会因何存系？

sentences.english: The French horn has a beautiful sound.
Special microphone-core design, sound effects better.
sentences.chinese: 特殊的咪芯设计，音色效果更佳。

sentences.english: The bell has a beautiful tone.
Keyboard players are often dumbfounded when it comes to choosing an appropriate sound on the electronic keyboard.
sentences.chinese: 电子键盘手常为选择适当的音色而感到困惑。

sentences.english: The stentorian voice, the timbre is exquisite, can turn on lathe the palace to transfer, 12 law sound accompaniments are prepared.
sentences.chinese: 声音宏亮，音色优美，能旋宫调转，十二律伴音齐备。

sentences.english: Number pad with convenient screen and pad buttons with visual and tone confirmation of being pressed.
sentences.chinese: 数字键盘屏幕和便捷的视觉和音色确认被压垫按钮。

sentences.english: Hammer Head: Made of Germany-made felt, it has pure, beautiful tone and strong expressive force.
sentences.chinese: 采用德国制造的呢毡，音色纯正优美，表现力强。

sentences.english: With solemn sound, - and thousand others more.
sentences.chinese: 发出庄重的音色，还有无数别的声音相谐。

sentences.english: Only male humpbacks sing, and each group of whales sings its own tune.
sentences.chinese: 只有雄鲸才歌唱，并且每个都有自己的音色。

sentences.english: Does a wood bodied harp sound better than a plastic bodied harp?
sentences.chinese: 木格口琴比塑格口琴音色更好吗？

sentences.english: Music Timbre, as determined by overtones.
sentences.chinese: 音色，如由泛音所决定的。

sentences.english: The sound of whistle is euphonious , emotional, and melodic.
sentences.chinese: 口哨的音色悦耳动听，抒情性极强，极富歌唱性。

sentences.english: The background music, Moonlight, was from Claude Debussy (1862-1918). I feel the harp in it, maybe.
sentences.chinese: 德彪西的《月光》，我似乎感受到了竖琴的音色。
